meanings.definition: The state or condition of being excessively overweight or fat.
meanings.sent1: Her obesenesses made it difficult for her to climb the stairs.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised him to exercise regularly to reduce his obesenesses.
meanings.sent3: Despite his obesenesses, he still enjoyed dancing at parties.
meanings.sent4: The city's obesenesses in fast-food restaurants was alarming.
meanings.sent5: The obesenesses of the elephant was a sight to behold at the zoo.

meanings.definition: The quality or characteristic of being obese.
meanings.sent1: The obesenesses of the cake was evident in its rich frosting.
meanings.sent2: She was proud of her obesenesses as it showed her love for good food.
meanings.sent3: His obesenesses in collecting vintage cars was well-known in the community.
meanings.sent4: The obesenesses of the clouds filled the sky before the storm.
meanings.sent5: The obesenesses of the bear was a result of its hibernation period.
